Participants.evidence: 61 obese participants with T2DM who were randomized

Intervention.evidence: randomized to either an intensive lifestyle weight loss intervention for 1 year followed by a lower lifestyle weight loss intervention (LLLI) for 2 years or surgical treatments [Roux en Y gastric bypass (RYGB) or Laparoscopic adjustable gastric banding (LAGB)] followed by LLLI in years 2 and 3.

Objective.evidence: This study compared the remission of T2DM following surgical and non-surgical treatments.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Primary endpoints were partial and complete diabetes remission

Number_Randomised.evidence: 61 obese participants with T2DM who were randomized

Result_Outcome.evidence: Partial or complete T2DM remission was achieved by 40% (n=8) of RYGB, 29% (n=6) of LAGB, and no LWLI participants (p=0.0037).
